message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to counteroffer at $85.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $87.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Alice. I think $85 is still a fair price for the product. Let's try again at $86.
I understand you're sticking to your guns, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think $88 is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I think we can reach an agreement. I'm willing to pay $87 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob! I'm willing to give you a tiny bit more, but I think $89 is the absolute limit. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I see your point, Alice. I'm willing to pay $88 for the product.
